idea:
The venture has been started after the years of observation and experience that struggle by the businesses to find quality and authentic data for their research, worldwide.

Research is vital for an organization to analyse the market and to ensure that its strategy is inline with the upcoming changes. Let it be any sector, without research, no industry can compete or survive in the market.

Due to the pandemic, there are massive changes in the industry’s strategy. Few industries are in a change to overcome loss, while industries that were not known are earning millions.

To understand the market change and to know about the current market scenario, Lexis Business Insights plays a crucial role to bridge the research of the client’s requirement. Our team helps our clients with a high quality research which can be studied and decisions can be applied accordingly.


Most of our services are international, hence helps our country for foreign reserves.
name: Lexis Business Insights

idea:
A-Tech software solution is a fully integrated Productivity Solution Platform. It improves work efficiency and simplifies processes for 80% of today’s workforcethose who work outside of the office and away from desks.

A-Tech provides an all-in-one solution to its customers – augmented reality software, wearable computing devices, consultancy, configuration, and deployment services as well as support.

Augmented Intelligence for the business world:

A-Tech provides  augmented reality based enterprise wearable computing solutions. We help frontline workers to focus on what they are really good at: real-world physical tasks
name: A Tech Software Solution

idea: Hi! My name is Abhishek Akash Diggewadi. I am a typical South Indian Young Professional from Belgaum District, Karnataka State, India. I have done my schooling in New Mumbai, officially known as Navi Mumbai. I graduated with a Bachelor of Engineering Degree in Electronics at the University of Mumbai, Mumbai, India. Currently, I'm pursuing Master of Science Degree in Space Studies at International Space University (ISU), Strasbourg, France. As a natural born self-starter, I am dedicated, responsible, reliable, hard working & a passionate team player looking to put a 100% of myself into extra co-curricular activities. I am a follower of science & technology. One of the key skills that I value the most is great responsibility. Thus, I am committed to involve myself with every change.
name: DIGGEWADI ABHISHEK AKASH

idea:
Orasi is a global B2B marketplace for acquisition and Syndication of Entertainment content and Linear Channels (Live TV).


We have over 100 clients spread across 20+ countries and a library of 100,000 hours of VOD content from various countries and over 200 Linear Channels.


We are currently working with many OTT platforms in India, Australia, Indonesia, Africa, USA and have signed long-term contracts with them which have a potential of bringing a revenue of $3-5 Million in the next 2 years.


This is a highly scale-able business addressing a 2 Trillion Dollar Market Opportunity, with very little competition.
name: ORASI DIGITAL MEDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
